description:
You're about to learn how to Persuade, motivate, teach or inspire any audience through your pitch. You'll discover 33 practical strategies to help you:

  • Give an amazing pitch that actually changes behavior.
  • Become a more effective leader
  • Make killer public presentations
  • Rally support for a cause.
  • Improve your public speaking skills.
  • Hook any audience
  • Build physical performance skills
  • Test for understanding.
  • Create backing for your plan
  • Set up social Innovation and change
  • Pitch them to customers, investors, judges, advisors, mentors, etc.
  • Generate confidence that you can actually pull off what you are proposing
  • Create self-sales.
  • Develop social capital (the etiquette, connections, behaviors, attitudes, etc.)
  • Build a world of advocates and activists around you.
  • Grow your presentation skills.


Don't take our word for it. Listen to what others have to say:

“Jason's tips have revolutionized my pitches and presentations at large conferences and internally."

Justin Beck, CEO, PerBlue

“Jason's techniques have improved my ability to face confrontation with confidence and encourage brainstorming among my sales force."

Stephen Eisenberg, President of Kenwal Steel

“I figured Jason Teteak might have a few new tricks—but not much that I hadn't heard before. I was wrong."

Phillip Deloria, Professor and Associate Dean

University of Michigan

“Wow. Just before I heard Jason speak, I had just finished a PowerPoint. Now I want to redo it! Best … Class … Ever!"

Craig Joseph, MD, Chief Medical Information Officer, Agnesian Healthcare
title: How to Perfect Your Pitch
